item.title: Wallet
item.description: A wallet is a place to hold tokens, it might be online at an exchange, at your browser like metamask or a piece of software running on your computer or mobile phone. A wallet has an address and it’s protected by a seed phrase that is used to restore it on another device and usually by other methods like pin or passwords to protect it from misuse. Each wallet is used on a network and others, allow several networks, providing different addresses on each one to receive the funds or cryptocurrencies.

item.title: Wise
item.description: Wise.com is a platform to make bank transfers (wire transfers) cheap across countries, which is ideal to bring money from accounts overseas into your own country.
